```scss
// Property: UIApplicationOpenURLOptionsOpenInPlaceKey
// Description: When the value of this property is false, you must copy the document to maintain access to it. If the flag is not set, you also must copy the document before you can use it.
// Component(s): OpenURLOptions
'.uiapplication-open-urloptions-in-place-key': { UIApplicationOpenURLOptionsOpenInPlaceKey: true }
'.uiapplication-open-urloptions-in-place-key-false': { UIApplicationOpenURLOptionsOpenInPlaceKey: false }
```
